reviewText: If it's the movie I think it is , with a spotlight on Grumpy, my 5 year old daughter loved , as did I . We had fun watching it together . I Love the new redoing of the Grumpy character . He's funny and charming .
This is just three regular Care Bear episodes back to back that sort of have a "mystery" theme to them.
My 3 year old could watch this for hours, days, months!  She loves the slightly scary aspect of this special, but still so fun!
my granddaughter loves it Thank you
My daughter didn't like this at all. She loves care bears but didn't even finish watching it.

These are three very fun Care Bear Halloween stories.  In one they help Sweet Dreams bear get her good dreams back.  One they solve the mystery of Scare Bear.  The last one Grumpy accidentally spreads his grump making Care-a-lot into Grump-a-lot and he has to fix it.  Recommended for anyone who likes care bears or Halloween stories.
This had nothing to do with Halloween or really any mystery. This was just 3 episodes that are all free on Netflix. Don't waste your money.
Daughter loves this movie we watch it over and over
my daughter loves these shows but they are all free on netflix.
My 3 year old likes all the Care Bears shows old and new and this one is one of his favorites
Cute Halloween movie my daughter love it& talked about Scare Bear for weeks afterwards
Two out of the 3 videos in this compilation are free on Netflix.

Bought this b/c my daughter loves Halloween. Disappointed b/c there is no Halloween themed episode on the DVD, which is odd b/c there are stills from a halloween episode on the packaging, and it says "Halloween themed" in the description. Very misleading. It's just 3 regular episodes from the show.
My twin granddaughters watch this one almost daily, before breakfast!  Then they start their day.
